frontmatter.title: Run ADOT Collector Examples with Docker
frontmatter.description: This example will introduce how to install ADOT Collector to collect metrics/traces data from a sample application running in the Docker container. The sample application will generate Open Telemetry Protocol (OTLP) format based metrics and traces data and send to AWS CloudWatch and X-Ray consoles. Please follow the steps below to try ADOT Collector.
